name: Fasteroids
description:
This is a 3-day project, and the first thing I made with GameMaker (not my first game, though). It was really a lot of fun to make and I think I will use this tool more in the future... I will probably be making another game using this control style because I like the quick-turn, so stay tuned!

CONTROLS:
Up arrow = Thrust forward
Left/Right arrow = Turn
Down arrow = Quick-reverse/brake
Spacebar = Fire
R key = Reset game

New stuff spawns when you clear the screen of asteroids and enemies. You die in one hit, but you have 2 extra lives. There are 4 stages in this version of the game.
